message:
Today we celebrate that our newsletter grew to 1000 subscribers with a special discount on our coloring books.

You can save up to 30% for a limited time on our Beach Time, Cute Frogs and Realistic Frogs coloring books. 
 
GET YOUR DISCOUNT HERE >> https://amzn.to/3CHm8ai

Unwind with our Beach Time coloring book! A great way to relax and enjoy your downtime. And don't forget to bring it out when you're on vacation! 🎉🎨🌟 

🆕 🆕 🆕 BEACH TIME COLORING BOOK  🏖️☀️🐬🕶️ (OUR NEWEST RELEASE) 🖍🖌📚🎨🎨

✅✅✅ GET YOUR PAPERBACK VERSION HERE >> https://amzn.to/3oAsF0t 

Coloring Crumb’s Beach Time Coloring Book offers a satisfying collection of beach illustrations. Enjoy beautiful pictures of palm trees, beaches, and sandy shores. Put your creativity to the test with these fun, delicate designs and enjoy yourself some summer fun!
It is a great gift for your family, loved ones, or anyone who would like to partake in a creative and low-stress hobby.

Explore the wild with realistic frogs in their natural habitat of leaves, flowers, branches, and other beautiful plants! 💥🌟🎨

REALISTIC FROGS 🐸🐸🐸(OUR NEW RELEASE)

GET YOUR PAPERBACK VERSION >> https://amzn.to/3aSFvUp

Coloring Crumb’s Realistic Frog Coloring Book offers a satisfying collection of frog illustrations that are high-quality, beautiful, and affordable. Each scene depicts real frogs in their natural environment with a fun mix of plants, flowers, greenery, and more! The Realistic Frog Coloring Book serves as a great resource to relax, destress, be creative, and have fun! It is a great gift for your family, loved ones, or anyone who would like to partake in a creative and low-stress hobby. This wonderful book was created to provide the endless benefits of coloring with the perfect combination of simple and intricate designs.

CUTE FROGS 🐸🐸🐸 (OUR NEW RELEASE) 

GET YOUR PAPERBACK VERSION >> https://amzn.to/3PMdZa5

Coloring Crumb’s Cute Frog Coloring Book offers a satisfying collection of frog illustrations that are both beautiful and affordable. Each scene depicts cute frogs in their natural environment with a fun mix of streams, flowers, plants, and more! The Cute Frog Coloring Book serves as a great resource to relax, de-stress, be creative, and have fun. It is a great gift for your family, loved ones, or anyone who would like to partake in a creative and low-stress hobby.

Shiny - The Little Sunbean: A Coloring Book To Enjoy The Story Of Shiny And Her Friends In Your Own, Colorful World. A Wonderful Gift Idea For Little Ones

GET YOUR PAPERBACK VERSION >> https://amzn.to/3NXuGOx

Parents and teachers of the very young will love giving this book to their children for coloring. The story follows a day in the life of Shiny, the smallest sunbean, as she wakes for a busy day of playing and learning at the edge of a magical forest.

Sunbeans are seldom personified, and Shiny’s voice provides a charming atmosphere for her group of friends, which includes naughty Birdie who doesn’t want to tidy her nest, excitable Bunny who climbs over his siblings to come and play, and even a wonderfully clever flower garden. And of course, the mother of all the sunbeans: the Sun.

Shiny - The little Sunbean: A Coloring Book offers poetic imagery which your children can color on their own, delightful characters, and a wonderful sense of all being right with the world that will ensure this book become a firm favorite.

Please note that this is the coloring book version of Shiny - The Little Sunbean. In you want to purchase the already colored story book please check our page on Amazon.

Shiny - The Little Sunbean: A Joyous Storybook To Find Out More About Shiny And Her Friends. A Wonderful Gift Idea For Little Ones. 

GET YOUR PAPERBACK VERSION >> https://amzn.to/3AINWMH

Parents and teachers of the very young will love reading this book aloud to their children. Beautifully illustrated, the story follows a day in the life of Shiny, the smallest sunbean, as she wakes for a busy day of playing and learning at the edge of a magical forest.

Sunbeans are seldom personified, and Shiny’s voice provides a charming atmosphere for her group of friends, which includes naughty Birdie who doesn’t want to tidy her nest, excitable Bunny who climbs over his siblings to come and play, and even a wonderfully clever flower garden. And of course, the mother of all the sunbeans: the Sun.

The first in a series that will change the way you and your little ones see the world, Shiny, The little Sunbean offers poetic imagery, delightful characters, and a wonderful sense of all being right with the world that will ensure this book become a firm favorite.
